contest-event.event-date:
March 9, 2002 D Silkeblæs
SilkeBlæs 100 Entertainments Contest SilkeBlæs silkebls
This contest is held every other year. Until 2002 it was held in even-numbered years. It was held in 2005 instead of 2004 and has since continued in odd-numbered years. The same happened in 2017/8, with the 2018 contest divided into sections.
Teatersalen, Silkeborg, Central Denmark, Denmark Soloist prize: Peter Lundorf, Tenorhorn, Lyngby-Taarbæk Brass Band
Sept. 19, 2011, 7:42 p.m. May 21, 2012, 8:52 p.m.
1 Lyngby-Taarbaek Brass Band Jesper Juul Windahl
2 Århus Brass Band Frode Rydland
3 Stavanger Brass Band Selmer Simonsen
4 Silkeborg Blaeserne Henrik Svenning
5 Concord Brass Band Frode Amundsen
6 Odense Brass John Frederiksen
7 Svogerslev Brass Band Åge Fjellerup Hansen
8 Nordvestjysk Brass Band Jørn Sverre Andersen
9 Aalborg Brass Band Gert Nørgaard
10 Solna Brass Lars-Gunnar Björklund
